pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Imputation by Distance Aided Donor Selection // Contains the function mice.impute.midastouch(). Technically this function is to be run from within the 'mice' package (van Buuren et al. 2011), type ??mice. It substitutes the method 'pmm' within mice by 'midastouch'. The authors have shown that 'midastouch' is superior to default 'pmm'. Many ideas are based on Siddique / Belin 2008's MIDAS.
